page.title: 12Education: Field Studies
page.content: Hill End Field Study Centre is situated off the Eynsham Road between Dean Court and Farmoor. The site is owned by the University of Oxford and run by the Oxfordshire County Council. Children from schools within a six-mile radius use it for field study. 179 children are in residence in groups from March 1st to October 30th each year; there are also two non-resident groups a day throughout the school year, a total of approx. 300 children. Hill End is one of the oldest centres of its kind in the country. During the summer months other organisations also come to Hill End sometimes camping in the grounds.
